about_the_game:
This is a game of fighting monsters and upgrading explosive equipment.
-----------------------------------------------------------------
After entering 'Slime's Choice', you will play the role of a slime and constantly become stronger in the game. Fight monsters, upgrade, and explode equipment.
Utilize various skills and techniques to obtain different equipment rewards from monsters to make characters stronger and stronger.
-----------------------------------------------------------------
Slime's Choice is a 3D single player adventure game that combines elements of RPG and other game genres.
It is a game with 2K maps and an open world.
Unique monsters, unique world style, make you a hero! Become a hero! Become the ruler of this world!
-----------------------------------------------------------------
There is also a lottery system in the game, and the lottery tickets generated can be used for lottery, allowing players to receive different random rewards for their efforts!
It also has a unique equipment recycling system, where you can recycle the collected equipment to obtain other resources, thus improving yourself and becoming stronger faster!
Collecting coins, you can purchase your favorite items in a random coin store, which is one of the ways to become stronger, but the better the item, the more coins it requires.
Let's start chopping monsters!!!
